__TOC__

Welcome to the Winnipeg chapter of the Ubuntu Canada team.

=== Goals ===
* To facilitate the promotion of Ubuntu and FOSS in Winnipeg
* To allow local Ubuntu users to meet, collaborate and support each other

=== Resources ===
* '''Ubuntu Canada Website''': https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CanadianTeam/
* '''Ubuntu Winnipeg Google Group''': <nowiki>[[http://groups.google.com/group/ubuntu-winnipeg]]</nowiki>
* '''Ubuntu Canada Mailing List''': <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-ca|ubuntu-ca list]]</nowiki>
* '''IRC Channel'''
** Server: irc.freenode.net
** Channel: #ubuntu-ca

=== Get Involved ===
Getting involved is simple. If you are enthusiastic and passionate about sharing the joy of Ubuntu, then please, we invite you to join us on IRC or the Ubuntu Canada mailing list and share your ideas with us.
